description: Number of collinear triples in a 3 X n rectangular grid.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-2,-2,3,-1).
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,b,i; b:=8; a:=-2; for i from 0 by 1 to n do b:=b-7+sum('(5*(k mod 2)+((k+1) mod 2))','k'=0..i); a:=a+b; print(a); od; end: P(200); - _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 24 2007
